verses.name: Genesis 48:7
verses.text: And as for me, when I came from Padan, Rachel died by me in the land of Canaan in the way, when yet there was but a little way to come unto Ephrath: and I buried her there in the way of Ephrath; the same is Beth–lehem.

verses.name: Genesis 48:8
verses.text: And Israel beheld Joseph’s sons, and said, Who are these?

verses.name: Genesis 48:9
verses.text: And Joseph said unto his father, They are my sons, whom God hath given me in this place. And he said, Bring them, I pray thee, unto me, and I will bless them.
